title: Heraclitus ridens redivivus, or, A dialogue between Harry and Roger concerning the times
author: Brown, Thomas, 1663-1704.
notes: L'Estrange is "represented as confessing to his pamphleteering rival Henry Care ... a sense of remorse for his assaults on the dissenters."  Cf. DNB.
Written by Thomas Brown.  Cf. DNB.
